EmailTemplate.description: CE information to easily respond to Customer requests
EmailTemplate.name: CE: Pre-Approval
EmailTemplate.subject: DSPS CE Provider Approval
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Today}
Dear {!MUSW__License2__c.Applicant_Full_Name__c},
In order for continuing education to count for your credential type, it has to have been pre-approved by the DSPS Office of Exams and Education, prior to you taking to course. The course provider would have been assigned a DSPS Provider ID # and Course ID # and would know how to submit your attendance into our online system on your behalf using your credential number. Please verify with the provider. You can find a list of some pre-approved courses at - https://dsps.wi.gov/Pages/Professions/TradesContinuingEducation.aspx
Thank you, The Wisconsin Department of Safety and Professional Services
